Package user

Class Courier

java.lang.Object
user.User
user.Person
user.Courier
public class Courier extends Person
The Courier class represents a courier who delivers orders. It extends the Person class and adds specific properties and methods for a courier.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Courier

      public Courier(String username, String password, String userType, String name, String surname, String phoneNumber, int orderCount, boolean onDuty, Location loc)
      Constructs a new Courier object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the courier
      password - the password of the courier
      userType - the type of user (e.g., courier)
      name - the name of the courier
      surname - the surname of the courier
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the courier
      orderCount - the number of orders delivered by the courier
      onDuty - the availability status of the courier
      loc - the current location of the courier
